job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongICAST is a national nonprofit that delivers green upgrades in multifamily housing that tackles our affordable housing climate change and social equity crisis ICAST is the nations premier service provider to apartment communities that serve lowtomoderate income LMI residents We value education that motivates people to act leading to results that foster local economic development environmental stewardship and social responsibility in underserved communities By 2025 we aim to serve 100000 LMI households annually by reducing their utility costs by 270 Million reduce Carbon emission by 15 million tons create 2000 sustainable jobs and invest over 100 Million in local communities We are looking for the smartest entrepreneurial and committed new team members who wish to make a differencebrbrstrongICAST may be a fit for you if brbrstrongYou consider yourself an overachiever Are looking to leave your mark on society Are an outofthebox thinker Strive to be efficient and productive at all times Are dedicated to saving the planet and helping others less fortunate than you And are passionate about ICASTs missionbrbrstrongThis position might be a fit for you if brbrstrongYou are a Data Engineer with solid technical and interpersonal skills responsible for developing and managing business intelligence and analytics solutions critical to running our business This includes solution design and development data acquisition and development of all queries and visuals to provide solutions that are intuitive intelligent and interactive You will be responsible for writing advanced queries and developing reporting capabilities not limited to dashboards reports or data extracts The Data Engineer will be part of all phases of the development lifecycle including gathering and analyzing userbusiness requirements system design implementation testing and operational supportbrbrstrongYour typical day might include the following activities brstrongul liDatabase Data Warehouse DataMart design and developmentli liData extracts queries stored procedures and functions to manipulate and prepare data for analysis and reportingli liDesigns builds and deploys business intelligence solutions including dashboards reports custom analysis and data extractsli liDocuments solutions and maintains information libraries and data dictionariesli liBuild alliances with Business Development Engineering Sales Marketing and Accounting teams to solve problems and achieve objectives by sharing knowledge and informationli brulstrongLocation strong USA  RemotebrbrstrongReports to strong IT ManagerbrbrstrongSkill Level strong MidseniorbrbrstrongCompensation strong 70K120K DOEbrbrstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongstrongMust Have Experience brstrongul li1 year with design and development of data warehouses li li1 year with any of the following Azure MS Power Platform MSSQL Python Ruby Spark REST JSON DataVerse Common Data Serviceli li1 Year using BI and Visualization tools eg PowerBI Qlik Tableau etcli liDemonstrated ability to develop advanced MSSQL solutions to fully automate datadriven dashboards reports and workflowsli liUnderstands the software development life cycle process and Agile methodologiesli liStrong written and verbal communication skills can articulate complex concepts to nontechnical audiencesli liAble to create intuitive and interactive reporting solutions that enable users to perform ad hoc analysis and drill to detailsli liSkilled at optimizing queries and reportsli liCapable of troubleshooting reports and query issuesli liAbility to work independently and effectively manage multiple prioritiesli liPossesses advanced SQL development skills including writing complex queriesviews creating functions stored procedures and table value functions in SQL Serverli liExcellent query and data manipulation skills using SQLli liAble to read and understand data models and entityrelationship diagramsli liExperience with Analysis Services or Web technologies a strong plusli liAbility to work independently to research issues gather information and prioritize tasksli liExperience with commandline scripting or familiarity with objectoriented programming for data retrieval is a plusli brulstrongEven Better If You Have brstrongul liAdvanced knowledge of Microsoft PowerBI DataFlows DataLakes and Power Platform Productsli liDirect experience with more than one of the following Azure Synapse Analytics Amazon Redshift Snowflake Google BigQuery Azure li liBaseline understanding of advanced topics  Big Data AI Machine Learning Predictive Analytics etcli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liCompany Health Insurance plan for the employee at no cost emememcharges will be added for spouse and family coverageem li liAvailable Vision and Dental Insurance and Life Insurance coverageli li403b Retirement Savings Plan available on day 1li liUp to 400 in annual gymfitness membership reimbursement through our healthcare programli liICAST is transitioning to an Unlimited PTO policy and this position would be eligible for it once it is implementedliul
